name: Modernschool
body:
### Hi there, go to the development pages of Modern School

### Table Attributes and associations 
We use this image as reference for database and models design:
![Database and models design](http://storage4.static.itmages.com/i/15/0518/h_1431963506_6296814_54f5e03736.png)

### This simple text representation of above image
```
Users
	email
	encrypted_password
	salt	
	first_name
	second_name
Teachers
	email
	encrypted_password
	salt
	first_name
	second_name
	biography
	about
Exams
	teacher_id( belongs_to Teacher)
	date
	exam_title
	description
Exams_Students
	student_id( has_many_and_belongs_to)
	exam_id
Posts
	teacher_id( belongs_to Teacher)
	title
	body
Courses
	teacher_id( belongs_to Teacher)
	title
	description
Lessons
	course_id( belongs_to Course)
	title
	content
Comments
	commentable_id (polymorphic)
	commenable_type
	body
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
